children.value: To create a new order on Cashfree, send a POST request to the class URL containing the contents of the order. For example, to create the order from sample code below:
//Send this payment link to customer over email/SMS OR redirect to this link on browser
Currency for the order. INR if left empty. See the Currency Codes below for a list of available currencies. Please contact care@cashfree.com to enable new currencies
A help text to make customers know more about the order
Notification phone number, which will get notified when payment for the order succeeds. Use it to accept COD payments
Return URL to which user will be redirected after the payment (max-len 500)
Notification URL for server-server communication. Useful when user’s connection drops while re-directing (max-len 500)
notifyUrl should be an https URL
Allowed payment modes for this order. Available values: cc, dc, nb, upi, paypal, wallet.
Status of API call. Values are - OK and ERROR
link of payment page for that order. Returned when status is OK
reason of failure when status is ERROR
Returns payment link for an existing order. Further, you can send it the customer via email or sms. For example, to get the order link refer the sample code below:
status of API call. Values are - OK and ERROR
returns payment link for that order when the status is OK
returns failure reason when status is ERROR
Returns all the details for an order(not transaction)
Status of API call. Values are - OK and ERROR
Merchant generated order Id for the order
Total Amount to be paid for this order
The status of the order payment. Either "ACTIVE" or "PAID"
The time of creation of order
Returns payment status of an existing order. This can also be used to query order status at any point of time.
Status of API call. Values are - OK and ERROR
link of payment page for that order. Returned when status is OK
reason of failure when status is ERROR
transaction status, if a payment has been attempted
transaction time, if payment has been attempted
transaction message, if payment has been attempted
transaction reference id, if payment has been attempted
payment mode of transaction, if payment has been attempted
payment mode of transaction, if payment has been attempted
Name of the bank if payment has been attempted (only in case of Netbanking)
Masked card number if payment has been attempted (only in case of Debit & Credit Cards)
Country code of the card if payment has been attempted (only in case of Debit & Credit Cards)
Scheme of the card (eg: VISA) if payment has been attempted (only in case of Debit & Credit Cards)
If No payment is attempted against an order, then the status of the order will be
would be CANCELLED in the response if a user lands on the payment page and clicks on 'back to merchant' instead of selecting a payment mode and proceeding with the transaction.
are only available for Netbanking and Credit/Debit Cards.
Response for a succesful payment made against an order :
Order status when a transaction gets FLAGGED and then goes to SUCCESS /CANCELLED :
// This will get updated based on whether transaction was approved (SUCCESS) or rejected (CANCELLED)
Returns message stating if the payment successful email was delivered or not
Status of API call. Values are - OK and ERROR
Message saying if the email was delivered or not.
reason of failure when status is ERROR
